sqlMap.delete: delete from ROLLUP_VALUE where ROLLUP_SERIES_ID = #rollupSeriesId# and ROLLUP_ATTRIBUTE_ID = #rollupAttributeId# and START_DATE >= #startDate# and END_DATE <= #endDate#
sqlMap.sql: insert into ROLLUP_VALUE ( ROLLUP_SERIES_ID, ROLLUP_ATTRIBUTE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, GROUP_BY_VALUE, CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT_VALUE, SUM_VALUE ) select #rollupSeriesId#, #rollupAttributeId#, #startDate#, #endDate#,
sqlMap.insert: g.CONSTITUENT_ID, g.CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT(g.$fieldName$), SUM(g.$fieldName$) from GIFT g where g.DONATION_DATE >= #startDate# and g.DONATION_DATE <= #endDate# group by g.CONSTITUENT_ID, g.CURRENCY_CODE

gik.CONSTITUENT_ID, gik.CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT(gik.$fieldName$), SUM(gik.$fieldName$) from GIFT_IN_KIND gik where gik.DONATION_DATE >= #startDate# and gik.DONATION_DATE <= #endDate# group by gik.CONSTITUENT_ID, gik.CURRENCY_CODE

g.CONSTITUENT_ID, g.CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT(ag.$fieldName$), SUM(ag.$fieldName$) from ADJUSTED_GIFT ag, GIFT g where g.DONATION_DATE >= #startDate# and g.DONATION_DATE <= #endDate# and g.GIFT_ID = ag.GIFT_ID group by g.CONSTITUENT_ID, g.CURRENCY_CODE

cf.FIELD_VALUE, g.CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT(dl.AMOUNT), SUM(dl.AMOUNT) from GIFT g, DISTRO_LINE dl, CUSTOM_FIELD cf where g.DONATION_DATE >= #startDate# and g.DONATION_DATE <= #endDate# and g.GIFT_ID = dl.GIFT_ID and cf.ENTITY_ID = dl.DISTRO_LINE_ID and cf.FIELD_NAME= #customFieldName# and cf.entityType='distributionline' group by cf.FIELD_VALUE, g.CURRENCY_CODE

dl.$fieldName$, g.CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT(dl.AMOUNT), SUM(dl.AMOUNT) from GIFT g, DISTRO_LINE dl where g.DONATION_DATE >= #startDate# and g.DONATION_DATE <= #endDate# and g.GIFT_ID = dl.GIFT_ID group by dl.$fieldName$, g.CURRENCY_CODE
